Test Name: Amphetamine-Type Stimulants (ATS) Identification and Quantification, Meconium
Purpose: To identify and quantify amphetamine-type stimulants in neonatal meconium samples while preserving chain of custody.
Equipment: Gas Chromatography–Mass Spectrometry (GC-MS) or Liquid Chromatography–Mass Spectrometry (LC-MS) system
